promptcards.card: Do you squeeze the end or middle of the toothpaste tube to get it out?
promptcards.certoaction: Give the player to your left a piggy back ride around the room.

promptcards.card: Do you fold your clothes right out of the dryer?
promptcards.certoaction: Give the player to your left a piggy back ride around the room.

promptcards.card: Do you split your Oreos in half before eating them?
promptcards.certoaction: Give the player to your left a piggy back ride around the room.
